pages.text: $(thing)Phantomstep Essence$() is perhaps the most mysterious of all botanical magical substances. This ethereal essence exists partially between dimensions, appearing ghostly and translucent even when contained.$(br2)Unlike Blink Essence which enables teleportation, Phantomstep Essence grants the ability to pass through solid matter by temporarily shifting into a semi-ethereal state.

This rare essence can only be extracted from Phantomstep Flowers that have grown in areas with dimensional anomalies or strong End energy.$(br2)The essence appears to shift in and out of reality, sometimes seeming solid and other times nearly invisible.

pages.title: Essence Creation
pages.text: Phantomstep Essence is created through a specialized magical process that harnesses dimensional shifting energies. The essence retains the phase-shifting properties of the Phantomstep plant.

pages.title: Magical Properties
pages.text: $(li)Grants temporary incorporeality to objects or entities$(li)Allows passage through solid objects without damaging either$(li)Creates semi-permeable magical barriers$(li)Enhances invisibility and stealth enchantments$(li)Protects against physical damage

pages.title: Usage Notes
pages.text: Phantomstep Essence should be used with extreme caution. Improper use can result in partially phased objects or, in worst cases, permanent incorporeality.$(br2)$(italic)Warning: Never consume or directly apply Phantomstep Essence to living beings without proper magical containment spells. Doing so could result in permanent phase shifting of body parts.$()
